Package org.cvs.application.services

Interface QualificationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
QualificationServiceImpl
@Service
public interface QualificationService
Provides service operations that can be carried out with qualifications for specific candidates.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamiko J. Msosa

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Qualification addQualification​(Qualification qualification)
    Adds a Qualification to an existing Candidate instance.
    void deleteQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId)
    Marks a given Qualification instance as deleted in the database.
    Qualification getActiveQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId)
    Gets an active Qualification instance given its identifier.
    java.util.List<Qualification> getQualifications()
    Lists all active Qualification instances from the database.
    java.util.List<Qualification> getQualifications​(java.lang.Long candidateId)
    Lists all active Qualification instances for a specified candidate from the database.
    void retireQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId)
    Marks a given Qualification instance as retired, to bar it from future usage.

  • Method Details

    • addQualification

      Qualification addQualification​(Qualification qualification) throws EntryNotFoundException, EntryNotActiveException
      Adds a Qualification to an existing Candidate instance.
      Parameters:
      qualification - a new qualification that has a valid reference to an existing candidate
      Returns:
      a qualification that has been added to a candidates CV
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException
      EntryNotActiveException

    • getActiveQualification

      Qualification getActiveQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId) throws EntryNotFoundException, EntryNotActiveException
      Gets an active Qualification instance given its identifier.
      Parameters:
      qualificationId - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Returns:
      an active qualification if found
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException
      EntryNotActiveException

    • deleteQualification

      void deleteQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Marks a given Qualification instance as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      qualificationId - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException

    • retireQualification

      void retireQualification​(java.lang.Long qualificationId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Marks a given Qualification instance as retired, to bar it from future usage.
      Parameters:
      qualificationId - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException

    • getQualifications

      java.util.List<Qualification> getQualifications()
      Lists all active Qualification instances from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of active qualification instances

    • getQualifications

      java.util.List<Qualification> getQualifications​(java.lang.Long candidateId)
      Lists all active Qualification instances for a specified candidate from the database.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - the candidate to filter qualification instances for
      Returns:
      a list of active qualification instances
